content.description: Sit start on some pockets on the right side of the boulder and move up using an undercling or alternative beta to some thin holds to top-out.
content.location: Right most problem with a flat landing left of the tree.

content.description: Start with opposing, high, spread-out underclings. Use shitty feet to throw to the good shelf that you can reach standing on the ground. One move wonder. The lower you chose to start the harder it gets.
content.location: Starts on the flat, dug out landing at the bottom of the 45 degree approach ramp.

content.description: The easiest line at Bay View. Starts low on obvious, big holds and climb up and left via the seem to a spicy top-out.
content.protection: A couple pads on a slightly sloping downhill.

content.description: Same start as for Scenic Cruise; after the first few moves move right past some blank rock to a right sloping shelf and make your way to the top.
content.location: Starts on the center of the block.

content.description: Start right of Truth Serum on the large hueco or slightly right of it and traverse left via some good holds to the start of Scenic Cruise and top out the boulder.
content.location: Starts just in front of the lone tree.

content.description: Sit start on a decent right hand in the huge hueco and a low left hand out left on an angled side pull. Make some powerful moves up to the pinches then a big move up to a good edge right of the sharp V-slot.
content.location: 6 feet left of Scenic Cruise. Starts at low, huge hueco.

content.description:
Just left of Bayview Pinch. Use the "brick" like hold and go up. The tiny “crimp” holds to the left are off for the original V10/11version. Kinda chossy. Okay, lowball. This is not my vid

https://www.instagram.com/p/CEqQwTPpTpj/

Use the crimps to the left of Tiny Pinches (AKA Bayview Pinch). In other words, use the crimps that you do not use for Bayview Brick for the V6/7 version.

Low sit start a few feet left of Scenic Cruise on a left side-pull and a right edge and go up some not so very distinct holds. The only chalk you may see on this is your own if you're feeling around or actually trying it.
content.location: About 3 feet left of Scenic Cruise.
